info.name: Beta EasyChirp Twitter Legacy 2013
info.description:
This is an attempt to get back the Twitter Legacy using a third-party site that is Easychirp. 
It runs similar to twitter in 2010 that there's no auto play or auto refresh timeline. So this is a little bit nostalgic and the site is at the moment not being mantained anymore. 

Easychirp is an non java-script version of Twitter dedicated to Visually Impaired People to have access to the site with a light and readable version.
This version runs faster and it's similar to the twitter in 2013/2020 when it has the legacy mobile layout available. I'm currently in the beta stage for the site, so it might take some time to be good to use.
